title: BMC Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Assistant Professor Posts
description: Brihan Mumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Assistant Professor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Ch, DNB can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the BMC Notification 2025 . Interested candidates can apply on or before the last date. If you are looking for more, here is ...
